extendedInfo.description: AVX absolutely blows away Google Now, Siri and every other assistant when it comes to useful features. If you haven't tried it yet what are you waiting for? TRY IT FOR FREE NOW: http://www.eva4android.com/avxdownloadIt's the only assistant that has a dedicated car mode and literally over a hundred more features than the rest. Browse through the command list and you will see that it's no lie that AVX is the leader when it comes to useful features: http://www.eva4android.com/quickstartAVX is a must have app if you want to use voice to increase your productivity. It's like Siri but with so many truly useful functions you will wonder why it doesn't come standard with Android. It includes a dedicated Car Mode that is extremely useful if you want to use your phone while driving. It is the one application that makes your smart phone so much smarter. It includes a powerful Profiles feature that allows you to change loads of settings on your phone in one instant simply by changing the Profile. There are over 30 videos on YouTube (link below) that walk you though every aspect of the application. Take advantage of the free 28 day trial as you cannot possibly try it in a few hours let alone a week. Read the reviews to see what other people are saying and if you like it please tell your family, friends and co-workers.Who should use AVX? If you are looking for an application that provides hands-free operation of your phone then AVX is right for you. If you are just looking for an electronic friend to chat with then please go with one of the Siri clones. On the other hand if you want a real virtual assistant that has extremely useful functions that will make your life easier then give AVX a try.AVX has all the functions you'd expect your assistant to perform plus some that you probably never knew were possible. Here is a list of some of the functions that you wont find in most of the competition:â Voice messaging, emails, memos and journals using your own voiceâ Reading and replying to incoming text (incl. Google Voice) and email (incl. Microsoft Exchange)â Reading and replying to incoming instant messages via Google Talkâ Integration with Google+â Integration with Evernoteâ Integration with Taskerâ Home Automation with INSTEON. Turn on the lights and appliances, open the garage door and a whole lot more, all with voice commands or scheduled or based on your location.â Time based reminders. Remind you to do something on a day and/or time.â Location based reminders. Remind you to do something based on your location.â Location based actions. Perform any function that AVX can do based on your current location. Have AVX automatically text your wife when you leave the office.â Time based actions. Perform any function that AVX can do on a set day and timeâ In-Car mode including wake up phrase and fully customizable function buttonsâ Custom voice shortcuts to your phone applications. Give your apps any name you want and open them using that name.â Voice bookmarks to your favorite web sites.â Activate just by shaking your phoneâ Works with all Bluetooth Headsets and most In-Car Bluetooth devicesâ Read and write NFC tags on compatible devicesâ Remote control your phone over Google Talkâ Too many other features to listFor the full online manual please go to:http://www.eva4android.com/avxIf you don't already have a third party text to speech voice that replaces the default Pico voice on your phone I recommend SVOX Classic. Their voices will work with any text to speech app on your device. Download the Free SVOX Classic to demo the voices. AVX is English only. Please don't give 1 star ratings for not having your language.

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: I am on 4.1.2 and for some reason the program looks like it hears me but doesn\'t respond
reviews.author: Royce Davis

reviews.comment: Exceptional! I just wish I could use it more.  Too public for general use\tExcellent app - the model of promptness for support and fixes. Does all it states and more (so much more that it is amazing).  If I used a bluetooth or a Sound Band then this would be used all the time.  But with my MARTIAN watch or the phone speaker it is just too public.
reviews.author: MnoMno Pee

reviews.title: Absolutely Outstanding
reviews.comment: I love this app.  As more functionality than any other assistant program on the market.  There is no comparison and the dedication from the developer is amazing.  I have just about all of the other assistant program on the market, but find non can compare.  The primary assistant on the apple platform has a little bit of an edge on the natural language functions, but fails by comparison in the amount of features in this app.  With a little bit of reading of the manual, you won\'t look at others.  Absolutely f
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Practically perfect in every way
reviews.comment: AVX has the flexibility and power I wanted. I would rate 5 stars if there was a way to permanently silence until I manually confirm that I\'m ready to return to normal operation.
reviews.author: Stan England

reviews.title: awesome.....
reviews.comment: A truly useful assistant that does everything the maker claims and more. Before I quit using speaktoit and others I would try and ask them question etc. Never did I get a real response This maker of this application has responded back to me everytime. One time I simply asked the maker of this app what if avx could do this or that...next thing I know there was a update with what I had asked about. You want find that with the other assistants thanks Peter......
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant software
reviews.comment: Best personal assistant app around  by far.
reviews.author: David Dodd

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s3
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t lack features but the interface is too complicated.  A more usable interface is needed for this to become a mainstream app.
reviews.author: Josh Miller

reviews.title: Siri Destroyer Strikes Again. ..
reviews.comment: This is the best digital personal assistant for Android or any other platform. And it just keeps getting better and better and better. So many wonderful updates that make this in an incredible App that I cannot live without! I Can\'t wait to get the next update...Very Well Done Peter!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great app love it so much.
reviews.author: victor soto

reviews.title: Amazing app.
reviews.comment: This app is truly amazing and the developer Peter is amazing too. Quick to respond and just keeps making this app even more amazing with every update. Everyone should get this app. Try the 28 day trial and believe me you\'ll buy it afterwards,.its worth every penny.  Thanks Peter for a amazing app.
reviews.author: sherry mcbride

reviews.title: Hi
reviews.comment: Great app,well worth it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: I do a lot of road driving, so this app works great for me.

reviews.comment: Very useful application

reviews.title: The best ever
reviews.comment: She doesn\'t always unlock but still i love her
reviews.author: Christopher Leggett

reviews.title: Buy it!
reviews.comment: Best I\'ve ever used (27 years in the IT business). Fantastic documentation, great YouTube tutorial. Super fast developer response. Great job!!
reviews.author: D. West

reviews.title: Incredible App - Definitely worth it!
reviews.comment: This app is definitely worth the money!  Plus, Peter - the developer - is extremely responsive to any questions you may have.  There is a learning curve with learning all that this app can do - but well worth the time you invest and it is also fun to setup.  Take the time to watch all the videos and learn everything this app can offer.
reviews.author: Marcel Hobizal

reviews.title: A Prime Example....
reviews.comment: ... of Software That Makes A Smart Phone Smart.

reviews.title: So much fun!!
reviews.comment: This app is amazing and the developer goes so far above and beyond anything I would have expected!!
reviews.author: April Jasper

reviews.title: I drive 80 miles a day
reviews.comment: This app is amazing. Try it! You will like it.
reviews.author: Mark Keith

reviews.title: Excellent ai, one solitary question,
reviews.comment: is it possible to have avx pull and offer information from Google now? That would put the Feather in this cap so to speak. The fusion of Google nows just in time policy of providing information meshed with avx would be ungodly. Keep up the awesome work and updates!
reviews.author: Kraj Nelson
